title: not able to send messages from some accounts
content:
I have 3 emails under a custom domain that i purchased through porkbun. I don't know the terminology but I am also using microsoft 365 as a domain? I purchased www.traditionsmeatco.com domain through porkbun but have emails through microsoft 365 cole@traditionsmeatco.com and domonique@traditionsmeatco.com and support@traditionsmeatco.com.

Anyways, I also have a gmail account, cole.minnis@gmail.com, this email works properly receiving and sending.

It's the other three that are giving me and issue and the warning i am getting is saying check authorization method in outgoing server. I will attach the screen shot of the alert.

I messed with all the options on the authorization method and nothing works!

Please let me know what to do, I hate outlook and now I am having issues here. I also changed password but no that didnt fix it.
creator: cole.minnis

title: why doesn't thunderbird show my email?
creator: omdwe16

title: Error when trying to Get Messages - Error with account ...com.au (POP3)
content:
Hi,

I've been trying to get to the bottom of an error message that keeps coming up on my client's computer. They first noticed the error (ss) about a couple of weeks ago and anything from then won't download (incoming), but I believe they are able to send emails. I can see that the messages are 'waiting' on the server at least and they can temporarily use Webmail.

I looked through the forums and any other info I could find and have checked or tried the following:

  • If their Antivirus or Firewall are blocking access
  • There is enough space on their system
  • File permissions for the 'Thunderbird' folder
  • Access details
  • Downgrading to an earlier version of Thunderbird

Unfortunately the error is still coming up each time they try to get their messages.

They have been using Thunderbird for almost a year now with one minor issue in that time. And I'm a bit puzzled as to what to try next. Has something similar happened to anyone else? Any suggestions for what I can do or check next?

The email account is through their domain and hosting and they are using Windows 8 and Thunderbird version 102.15.1 (from version 115.18.0 - 32-bit).

Thanks
creator: metalphoenix

title: Vertical view issue
content:
Hi,

In the vertical view, the extreme right hand should be the message pane. But in my vertical view suddenly the message pane is getting divided in half horizontally from the middle.

The upper half is been taken by the webpage, and the lower half by the message display.

Ideally the whole right half use to come as message display.

Please help with solution.

Regards, Deepak
creator: deepakb0806

title: Import from Outlook is freeze crashing
content:
Hi, I'm trying to import all my emails from Outlook 2019 (5GB) on Windows 10 in KVM , TB 137.0.1 During the import process starts to hang / freeze after having imported about 1.4GB. When I check the task manager for activity, there is non. I.e. CPU activity is very low (where it should be about 80 - 100%) and no disk activiy is going on for about 30 min. I close Thunderbird, but I can't reopen TB. It says it's already open. So I kill the tb process. Then I re-open TB and it has about 1.4GB of e-mail imported. crash reports bp-2189a8c5-f639-4dd2-abfb-257f10250408 bp-34687354-02bc-4ebe-90fc-855d20250408

Is there something that can be done to fix the issue?

Thanks & Regards, Hermann
creator: hermann-san

title: allegati
content: Buongiorno a tutti. Da qualche giorno non riesco ad allegare file pdf ai messaggi in uscita. Quando compongo la mail e poi voglio allegare un file pdf, andando alla ricerca della cartella sul server dove è salvato il file che voglio inviare, mi allega il link alla cartella e non mi entra dentro alla cartella dove è salvato il file stesso. Come posso risolverlo? Grazie a chiunque mi risponderà. Buona giornata a tutti
creator: tommasopazzo
